detailsData.title: Practical Business Solutions
detailsData.content: We provide practical business solutions to our clients' legal problems. Our attorneys are skilled and tenacious advocates, but we recognize that the most aggressive (and expensive) approach may not be the best solution to a client’s problem.

detailsData.title: Client's Business Knowledge
detailsData.content: We learn our clients’ business and industry. We take the time to learn the business environment in which our clients operate so that the advice we provide fits the client.

detailsData.title: Responsive Service
detailsData.content: We recognize that we are in the client service business. We return calls and E-mails quickly and are highly accessible to our clients.

detailsData.title: Preventive Legal Advice
detailsData.content: We help our clients avoid legal problems. We provide thoughtful advice and counsel designed to anticipate and prevent claims and lawsuits, government investigations, and to support business risk management.

address: 940 South Coast Drive, Suite 180, Costa Mesa, CA 92626
valueProp: Bois Legal Counsel is a boutique law firm. We focus on only those areas we have expertise in. We founded the firm to provide 'big firm' quality work more economically. We can do this because our hourly rates are comparably lower and we use our expertise to limit legal activities to essential tasks.

testimonalData.text: Over the last 9 years our company has been very satisfied in our partnership with Tom Bois’ legal services. His knowledge and experience has proven to be a tremendous asset in the most complex situations.
testimonalData.author: Leo Liedke

testimonalData.text: I met Tom early in my career on environmental projects in mid-1990s. Later that decade, Tom defended me and my employer on a labor dispute, showing his excellence in labor law.
testimonalData.author: Bita Tabatabai

testimonalData.text: I have worked with Tom Bois for over 12 years on specialty Environmental Liability insurance placements and as corporate counsel. My experience with him exceeded expectations.
